name: La Concha
instructions:
1. Combine all of the ingredients in shaker with ice, then shake to chill.
2. Strain over crushed ice in a Collins glass.
description: What we wanted most [from this cocktail] was a classic Piña Colada flavor profile, but modeled after the fino sherries we couldn’t stop drinking," says Kalimotxo lead bartender Kate Houser. "Swapping in coconut water for coconut cream and adding in Lustau fino sherry made it light, dry, and completely crushable on a patio. The added perk is that you can have more than one in this Texas heat!

ingredients.name: Light Rum
ingredients.description: White rum, also known as light or silver rum, is a type of rum that is clear and colorless. It is often unaged or aged for a very short period in stainless steel or other neutral containers, which prevents it from developing the color and flavor that result from prolonged aging in wooden barrels.

ingredients.name: Pineapple juice
ingredients.description: Pineapple juice is extracted by passing fresh, ripe pineapple through a juice extractor (juicer) or by muddling fresh cut pineapple chunks and then straining out the solids.

ingredients.name: Coconut water
ingredients.description: Coconut water (also coconut juice) is the clear liquid inside young coconuts (fruits of the coconut palm).

ingredients.name: Sherry
ingredients.description: Sherry is a fortified wine that originates from the Jerez region in southwestern Spain. It is made from white grapes, primarily the Palomino grape variety, and is known for its unique production process, diverse styles, and complex flavors. Sherry has a protected designation of origin (DO) status, meaning that only wines produced in the designated region can be labeled as Sherry.

ingredients.name: Simple Syrup
ingredients.description: Syrup made with sugar and water. Usually in 1:1 or 2:1 ratio.
